data.title: "I am a decent person. But if you have not eaten in 3 days, you do shameful things to survive"-- Tormented typhoon victims scour for food.
Member of U.S. Army National Guard's Tactical Human Intelligence Team commits suicide; his suicide note says he was forced to commit "war crimes, crimes against humanity" in Iraq
Hundreds turn out for funeral of WWII veteran held on Remembrance Day following successful online campaign as the man had no family.
Wealth of world’s billionaires doubles since 2009
Mathematically-improbable voting pattern proves fraud in Philippine polls
Snowden asks Germany to support him against US 'persecution'
A sickening video of a man in Lebanon microwaving a cat has sparked outrage and calls for stricter animal cruelty laws in the region.

Zoologists hunting Tasmanian tiger declare 'no doubt' species still alive - Team claims that it has 'highly credible' witnesses & has found animal faeces that could belong to the extinct thylacine, last known one dying in a zoo in 1936.
South Korea has five times as many credit cards as people and more debt per capita than any other nation on earth
The Lies Shell is Telling About Oil Spills in the Niger Delta
